Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $15000. I am confident that once you experience its value, you will agree that this is a fantastic deal. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
